data.lyric:
[ti:Richer(feat. Polo G)]
[ar:Rod Wave/Polo G]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Richer(feat. Polo G) - Rod Wave/Polo G
[00:00.66]Lyrics by：Rodarius Green/Taurus Bartlett/Roland Hannah/Flynn Cranston
[00:01.32]The lotta fight I've been in
[00:06.78]Ooh ooh mm ayo Pluto you going brazy
[00:15.04]N***as ain't gettin' no money tell 'em quit that cappin' mmm
[00:18.46]N***as ain't gettin' no money tell 'em quit that cappin' mmm yeah
[00:21.97]In this b***h relaxin' you ain't even did your taxes yeah
[00:25.54]We went triple platinum Ion't wanna hear no naggin'
[00:28.42]Uh uh uh uh uh made it happen uh uh
[00:32.44]Youngin' out that bottom but he made it happen yeah
[00:34.96]I don't wanna make new friends point me to my ends
[00:38.42]Who he think he is in that brand new Benz
[00:42.03]They should've knew I was comin'
[00:43.19]Since a lil' youngin' I knew
[00:44.23]I would get me somе money skrrt
[00:45.46]Know I turned nothing to something I look at your cousin
[00:47.34]Thе youngin' six million and runnin'
[00:48.59]And I promise to keep it one hunnid keep it one hunnid
[00:51.01]You see me grindin' and hustlin'
[00:52.08]So you got to respect me f**k
[00:53.99]You give me my check please
[00:55.98]Youngin' chasin' dreams reachin' for the stars what else
[00:59.30]Be all you can be eat or you gon' starve what else
[01:02.56]A youngin' out that bottom but he beat the odds yeah yeah
[01:06.81]I ain't gon' lie I had it hard yeah yeah
[01:09.03]But now I'm richer than I've ever been what else
[01:12.40]I'm richer than I've ever been yeah
[01:14.85]I'm richer than I've ever been
[01:17.42]I'm richer than I've ever been ever been
[01:20.10]He richer than he ever been oh oh oh
[01:22.73]I'm richer than ever whippin' a Tesla cars hoes et cetera
[01:26.47]Hit him with pressure my n***as won't let up
[01:28.88]Tell them n***as to catch up oh
[01:31.38]Wake up got a million in diamonds
[01:32.49]That sit on the dresser oh
[01:34.51]Run up that check now I'm flexin'
[01:35.52]My muscles I feel like a wrestler
[01:37.48]Rollies and plaques
[01:38.42]Fake love it was holdin' him back
[01:40.18]Flashbacks while he pourin' the yak
[01:41.54]Since a young n***a he just wanted a sack
[01:43.21]Used to daydream 'bout thumbin' through racks
[01:45.31]Heat tuck it get cold in the 'Raq
[01:47.12]Tears fall while he loadin' the strap
[01:48.81]Seen it all he just wanna relax uh uh
[01:52.13]I'm richer than I ever been
[01:54.69]Put my heart before the bag worst s**t I ever did
[01:57.86]Gave you a second chance and you left again uh
[02:00.79]Member days I used to wonder would we ever win
[02:05.47]Youngin' chasin' dreams reachin' for the stars what else
[02:08.82]Be all you can be eat or you gon' starve what else
[02:12.24]A youngin' out that bottom but he beat the odds yeah yeah
[02:16.41]I ain't gon' lie I had it hard yeah yeah
[02:18.70]But now I'm richer than I've ever been what else
[02:22.04]I'm richer than I've ever been yeah
[02:24.43]I'm richer than I've ever been
[02:26.94]I'm richer than I've ever been ever been
[02:29.68]He richer than he ever been ever been ever been
[02:34.88]Uh uh uh uh mmh yeah
[02:40.59]Grrah
data.trans:
[ti:Richer(feat. Polo G)]
[ar:Rod Wave/Polo G]
[al:SoulFly (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.66]//
[00:01.32]我参与过许多争斗
[00:06.78]Pluto 你真是疯子
[00:15.04]那些家伙赚不到钱 让他们别再谎话连篇
[00:18.46]那些家伙赚不到钱 让他们别再谎话连篇
[00:21.97]跟这碧池逍遥快活 你甚至税都没付
[00:25.54]我们拥有三张白金唱片 不想听见任何挑剔的声音
[00:28.42]功成名就
[00:32.44]年轻人从底层开始打拼 但他还是功成名就
[00:34.96]我不想结交新的朋友 在我的领域对我指指点点
[00:38.42]坐上那崭新的奔驰 他就以为自己多么牛逼
[00:42.03]他们应该都知道我迎头赶上
[00:43.19]在我年少之时 我就知道
[00:44.23]我会赚到盆满钵满
[00:45.46]知道我能改变一穷二白的境地 我看上了你的表妹
[00:47.34]那小年轻 有了六百万存款还在努力奋进
[00:48.59]我发誓会永远真实 永远真实
[00:51.01]你看我辛苦奔波
[00:52.08]所以 你得向我致以敬意 
[00:53.99]请把我的支票给我
[00:55.98]年轻人追逐梦想 成为了闪耀明星 还有呢
[00:59.30]你得竭尽全力 否则只能坐以待毙 还有呢
[01:02.56]年轻人从底层爬起 但他奇迹般赢得胜利
[01:06.81]我不会说谎 我确实有段艰苦经历
[01:09.03]但现在我前所未有的富裕 还有呢
[01:12.40]我前所未有的富裕
[01:14.85]我前所未有的富裕
[01:17.42]我前所未有的 前所未有的富裕
[01:20.10]他前所未有的富裕
[01:22.73]我前所未有的富裕 开上特斯拉 豪车 美女 数也数不尽
[01:26.47]给他施加压力 我的兄弟们不会放松警惕
[01:28.88]让他们尽管来向我靠近
[01:31.38]一觉醒来 花费百万的钻石
[01:32.49]就躺在我的梳妆台上
[01:34.51]存款蹭蹭上涨 现在我大肆炫耀我的肌肉 
[01:35.52]我感觉我就是强壮的摔跤手
[01:37.48]财富和荣誉
[01:38.42]虚假的爱 让他望而却步
[01:40.18]在他开始喋喋不休的时候 闪回到以前
[01:41.54]从孩提时代起 他就想要赚大钱
[01:43.21]曾经幻想对着一堆钞票竖起拇指
[01:45.31]炙手可热的明星 因富裕而孤寂
[01:47.12]他装钞票的时候 眼泪滚滚流
[01:48.81]见识过所有 他只想好好放松
[01:52.13]我前所未有的富裕
[01:54.69]时时刻刻警惕财产不被偷走 比以前过得更不安心
[01:57.86]给了你第二次机会 你还是要走
[02:00.79]还记得曾经我怀疑过自己 我们能不能赢
[02:05.47]年轻人追逐梦想 成为了闪耀明星 还有呢
[02:08.82]你得竭尽全力 否则只能坐以待毙 还有呢
[02:12.24]年轻人从底层爬起 但他奇迹般赢得胜利
[02:16.41]我不会说谎 我确实有段艰苦经历
[02:18.70]但现在我前所未有的富裕 还有呢
[02:22.04]我前所未有的富裕
[02:24.43]我前所未有的富裕
[02:26.94]我前所未有 前所未有的富裕
[02:29.68]他前所未有 前所未有 前所未有的富裕
[02:34.88]//
[02:40.59]//
